directions: In a large saute pan, heat oil over low heat.  Add onion and garlic; cook and stir until onion is tender.  Stir in capers, tomatoes, lemon juice, and parsley.  Season with red pepper flakes to taste.  Simmer gently for 3 minutes to thicken sauce.  Fold in tuna, and heat through.
While sauce is cooking, add pasta to a large pot of rapidly boiling water; cook till just tender.  Drain well.
Toss pasta with sauce, and serve.
title: Pasta With Tuna Sauce
